Dm_ZO_0003_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>That statue is a symbol of hope for the
Zora...<sp:5:1:0> It is very precious to us.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thank you so much for cleaning it up!
Dm_ZO_0003_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I had heard that you were missing along
with Princess Zelda...<sp:5:1:0> If I may ask, what
brings you here?
Dm_ZO_0003_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>To think that such a thing took place
beneath Hyrule Castle.<sp:5:1:0> And now you are
traveling the kingdom to investigate...
Dm_ZO_0003_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Lady Yona, it is time.<sp:5:1:0> I fear we must be
going now.
Dm_ZO_0003_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>In truth, that statue...<sp:5:1:0>depicts the
majestic forms of the pair who saved
this cherished domain in the past.
Dm_ZO_0003_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_00>I am quite surprised to learn that you are
the legendary swordsman, Sir Link.
Dm_ZO_0003_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>So your search for Princess Zelda is
what brought you to this domain...
Dm_ZO_0003_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Ah, but if it pleases you...


After you have met with Sidon, perhaps
you could visit me at the <clr:0000>infirmary on the
floor above<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>I am determined to be of assistance to
you as best I can, Sir Link.
Dm_ZO_0003_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>That is right! Beloved Prince Sidon of the
Zora and his very best friend...Sir Link,
the heroic Hylian swordsman!
Dm_ZO_0003_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_02>In that case, feel free to investigate the
area around the domain as thoroughly
as you see fit.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh! I have a lovely idea!


<snd:LaughS_01>If you do not mind, I ask that you please
go and meet with Sidon.

I am certain that he would be delighted
to see you.
Dm_ZO_0003_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>It is simply wonderful, is it not?! How I
would love to meet him some day...
Dm_ZO_0003_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_00>Sidon can be found at <clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff>,
located<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>at the peak of Ploymus Mountain.
Dm_ZO_0003_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Say, you have a similar stature to the
Hylian hero. <sp:5:0:0>Similar eyes as well...<sp:5:1:0>
Dm_ZO_0003_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, I see.<sp:5:1:0> I should have anticipated
that you would have already visited
Mipha Court.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Hee-hee... <sp:5:0:0>If only I could have seen my
dear Prince Sidon's joyous face when he
saw you.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>But how strange that he hurried you off to
meet with me first. <sp:5:1:0>I do appreciate that he
worries about me so, but still...
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Sir Link, please do go and see my
Prince Sidon once more.

I feel certain that there is something
more that he would like to speak with
you about...
Dm_ZO_0003_42:
Oh my, and you are also a Hylian...<sp:5:1:0>


And a swordsman...<sp:5:1:0>
Dm_ZO_0003_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I have heard mention of you nearly every
day since I first arrived at this domain.
Dm_ZO_0003_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>I am Prince Sidon's... Oh, forgive me. I am
your best friend's fianc√©e.<sp:5:1:0>

My name is Yona.


<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I am truly honored to have the opportunity
to meet you, Sir Link.
Dm_ZO_0003_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Forgive me, Sir Link, but I must be on
my way.
Dm_ZO_0003_04: <sp:3:0:2:0801>I see you managed to wash it away!
Dm_ZO_0003_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Ahem!<sp:5:1:0> Please remember to mind your
manners, Chroma!
